## Behind the scenes

### Installation

- Dockerfile commands :
```dockerfile
RUN wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/rebar3/rebar3 && \
chmod +x rebar3 && \
./rebar3 local install

ENV PATH="${PATH}:/root/.cache/rebar3/bin"
```

- APK packages (Linux):
  - [erlang](https://pkgs.alpinelinux.org/packages?branch=edge&name=erlang)
